artist: Jack Larsen Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp.3/16-1/2" lt. & drk rust leather and vinyl strips separated by black threads forms weft. JLL card with textile info stapled to face.  Mounted to 11x8.50" card.  "H-3" printed on card. (rust)
title: Leather Cloth
